content: If you are looking for a Google Photos alternative this is it. It has many targets, I used OneDrive. Load all photos into OneDrive, sync it with the app. Refreshes well. No hangs. I checked the firewall etc and there is no funny business. I use the PhotoSync mobile app and control all of the uploads separately into OneDrive and SkyFolio reads them like a charm. Here is a tip: If you want to edit a photo, you click on the export command back to your gallery. Nice! Thanks üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
Great tool for working with photos and video on Onedrive. M akes it easy to share my pictures wherever I have WiFi.
Just bought the app. Love it! Can't believe you can no longer view photos nicely in OneDrive Mobile. Just concerned about giving them my Microsoft account info. Any word on their security?
replyContent: If you're asking about the app's security, the app never sees your account login. The login is handled by MS and MS provides the app an access token, which is only readable by the app. That token can be invalidated by you at any time via your MS account. The app doesn't send any data off device. See privacy policy on website for more info. Thanks!

content: Works great! I asked about OneDrive photo text search by MSFT, and the developer responded immediately, by adding it to SkyFolio right away. Outstanding support and a solid tool. Thank you!

It's not for me. Because there is no free trial, one must buy the app to download it. This is definitely a negative point for me. However from the developer view, forcing people to really evaluate the app might be a good thing.... hmmm.

content: Not working properly.

It's not bad. Shame that it lists EVERY folder inside the OneDrive account rather than just the folders selected to sync. If it had that, it would be well worthy of another star. Upload settings seem non-existent. I hoped I would be able to select what to auto-upload and what folder to auto-upload selected uploads to but it has no settings like that. If it did (along with the previously mentioned 'display sync folders only' filter), and a nicer icon, that would be a 5-star clincher.
Need more photo app experience

This App is just fantastic - especially now that it connects to OneDrive Business. We have in excess of 80,000 photos in about 100 folders and having the name of the folder added to the bottom of every Photo is fantastic. The features that come with this App - and the quick loading - make it by far the best (and cost effective) Photo and slideshow App by far on Google Play. Keep up the good work Brian - and thanks for the quick replies to help me through my fix. PS If you are twiddling your thumbs and want some more programming to do, A box and dark back ground around the folder title at the bottom of each photo would help with easier viewing of the title. :) :) Cheers and thanks again.

Responsive and dev and a great app. Far FAR better then the nonsense that viewing photo in the official OneDrive app, especially with the recent improvements to the sorring options in Skyfolio. Great app, great price.
great

replyContent: You don't have to pay anything.  I refund anyone that asks.  Please email me at snapwoodapps@gmail.com with your purchasing email address.  Thanks.

What a find! SkyFolio is a well designed, easy to use and a very customizable app. I had it running within minutes and it does exactly what I was looking for. My use case is as follows: I am a serious nature photographer and I upload my better images in high res to OneDrive. I like to "run" images as a slide show on my Sony XBR TV set in the family room. SkyFolio on my Cell Phone allows me to read the OneDrive based images, display them as a Slide Show and Cast them to my TV (all in the background). Very cool.
Nice App
Unfortunately I have a folder with over 14k photos and this app has a limit of 2k.
OneDrive can't do a slideshow! WTF? This app provided the perfect solution, and even finds photos in sub-folders. Nicely done.
All fixed and all good again :)   Great work
replyContent: Microsoft broke the method of login the app was using.  The app is now using a newer method.  Please update to v2.7.0 to fix the issue.  Thanks.

very useful

content: Excellent, displays Sky Drive as originally intended.
Nice app. I like it better than the "official" Microsoft app.

I got this app over other portfolio apps because when I demoed it, it played the videos on my skydrive. However, it doesn't auto-sync video and instead streams them every time. I know this is labeled as a photo folio, but my demos are in video form and it gave me false hope when it played my videos. I hope you add video sync functionality in the future.
Its easy to use! I can keep all my photos in one place and don't have to worry about losing them..love it!!

Very nice app, but needs multiple account login capability.  My wife and I keep our photos on separate Skydrives and would like the ability to seamlessly transition between both accounts on your app.  Do that and it's a five star app!  Great job!
Wanted a great program for tablet and this one is by far best of any! You get way more than what u pay! A+++++++++
Quick thumbnails, easy file actions, just what I was looking for to make the most of skydrive
This is good but still needs work on it.  I like better sorting access menu. But it's very quick and solid. I would recommend this to anyone using Skydrive.

Uploading from my Galaxy S2 to Skydrive is very quick.  Unlike the Sydrive app, there is a slide show feature, which can be set to work automatically when the app is activated.  Unlike the Skydrive app, as soon as you activate Portfolio, full size images are still there instantly, so you do not have to wait for downloads, as is the case with Skydrive.  It is very easy to create new albums/folders for your images, and to move them from one to the other.  Any changes you make to Skydrive via your PC - such as uploading, deleting etc. - will not reflect on Portfolio until you next charge your phone.  Skydrive on the other hand probably refreshes changes when activated, but to have all the photos full size, you may have to wait half an hour. However, a selected thumbnail instantly changes to full size, - but all the other images also become full size in the background - very very slowly. You can slide photos across the screen despite black gaps waiting for the full size transformation to take place. Portfolio slideshows seem to mix the contents of all albums, -  which is unfortunate.

Probably the only Skydrive app for Android that caches pictures and includes photo viewer with pinch to zoom support. Speed is decent but slower than Microsoft Skydrive for iOS, Win8, Mango.  Two problems for me:  1) It downloads low resolution pictures for screen with resolution less than 1280x720.  No problem for my Transformer but 10.1" panel with 1024x768 only download low resolution picture.  7" panel with 1024x600 screen probably suffers by the same glitch.    2) Slideshow only cycles thru pictures in current folder but excludes sub-folders.   If you are looking for a Skydrive app for photo, this is the best at the moment.  Having said that, I think you will get better result by using Foldersync Lite (Free) to sync your Skydrive to local folder, then use a dedicate Slideshow app like Free Photo Slide to view your pictures.
Great time saver.does  everything fast, makes organising files simple, no more stress
Very easy to use! Just got it installed and it immediately worked for me (on an ASUS tablet running ICS). I prefer Sky Drive to Picasa's what's yours is ours forever policy, and this did the trick.

Works great

Best Windows Live Skydrive photo gallery viewer for Android hands down. Best Windows Live Skydrive photo gallery viewer for Android hands down. None of the other apps I've tried even come close.    I had an issue where resized photos were displaying distorted.  The developer responded the next day and posted and update after communicating with me via email.  Awesome customer service, a great app and a great price.  What more could you ask for.
It gets the job done quickly and efficiently. Dev is quick to respond  feedback and patch through features. Well worth the money.
Perfect for accessing my photos to edit on tablet. Love the layout. Thank you! Awesome job.
I love being able to see all my albums so easily.  This app does exactly what it says it will do.

Good application, but I need to be able to Log Out of SkyDrive/MSN when i am done viewing. (Hence the 3 star review) Please add this and this will be a 5 star application.     Or maybe i just don't know how to log out yet??
